name: recall
title: Recall
description: Allows you to quickly capture your screen to remind you to get back to something in the future. All in Raycast and free!
author: matthew_su

commands.name: memory-dashboard
commands.title: Memory Dashboard
commands.description: Allows you to view and manage all the memories (of your screen) that you wanted to recall!

commands.name: capture-moment
commands.title: Capture Moment
commands.description: Allows you to capture your screen immediately and opens up a dashboard to add more descriptions to the memory.

preferences.name: storageDir
preferences.title: Storage Directory
preferences.description: Directory to store memories and screenshots

commands.name: capture-select-moment
commands.title: Capture Select Moment
commands.description: Allows you to capture a selected portion of your screen and save it as a memory.

preferences.name: storageDir
preferences.title: Storage Directory
preferences.description: Directory to store memories and screenshots

commands.name: delete-all-memories
commands.title: Delete All Memories
commands.description: Permanently deletes all memories and their associated screenshots.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
